In the name of God, the Merciful, the Compassionate.
I am writing to inform [.................]
Abū Isḥāq Ibrāhīm [........................]
[Homage from] the servant to the master [...................]
the noble [......................................]
for the service of [.............................]
a load of black [fabric? and ...................................]
and we will buy them two cloacks and [...] and [...] and [...].
I have advised you regarding the matters that concern you. I beseech God['s help] so I may rent their riding animals,
in the company of al-Khalīl. I beseech God for success. Peace be upon you. God's mercy and blessings
be upon my children. Peace be upon the dear [brother] Muḥammad and Ḥusayn's son
[...] Ṣubayḥ. Please send my regards to Ḥusayn, and tell him,
"Your uncle Abū ʿAlī sends his best wishes to you." Write me a letter soon about their [welfare].
If you find [...], send it along; or whatever he carries, or his [...].
Peace be upon you.
Peace and swift [relief?] to those under your care.
